  • java.lang.Object

    Callable<IGASStats>

    public class BigdataGASRunner<VS,ES,ST>
extends GASRunnerBase<VS,ES,ST>
    Base class for running performance tests against the bigdata backend.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Constructor Detail

      • BigdataGASRunner

        public BigdataGASRunner(String[] args)
                 throws ClassNotFoundException
        Run a GAS analytic against some data set.
        Parameters:
        args - USAGE:
        (options) analyticClass propertyFile

        Where:

        propertyFile
        A java properties file for a standalone Journal.
        and options are any of the options defined for the GASRunnerBase PLUS any of:
        -bufferMode
        Overrides the BufferMode (if any) specified in the propertyFile.
        -namespace
        The namespace of the default SPARQL endpoint (the namespace will be kb if none was specified when the triple/quad store was created).

        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
